subject: Trades (Sports)
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The team that traded for Brett Favre and Santonio Holmes, that signed Jason Taylor and LaDainian Tomlinson and Plaxico Burress, hasn’t learned that championship teams are built, not bought.
snippet: The team that traded for Brett Favre and Santonio Holmes, that signed Jason Taylor and LaDainian Tomlinson and Plaxico Burress, hasn’t learned that championship teams are built, not bought.
